traits.name: False Appearance
entries: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

traits.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny scarab. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Swarm of Bites
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 13 (3d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage if the swarm is at half of its hit points or fewer, and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.
